description: Create a floating IP for a given tenant.
name: floatingip-create

dns_domain.description: Assign DNS domain to the floatingip (requires DNS integration extension)

dns_name.description: Assign DNS name to the floatingip (requires DNS integration extension)

floating_ip_address.description: IP address of the floating IP

floating_network_id.description: ID or name of the network from which the floating IP is allocated.

format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: json, shell, table, value, yaml)

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

subnet.description: Subnet ID on which you want to create the floating IP.
